intro: Fiorinia, commonly known as the fairy lantern, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, Madagascar, and the Caribbean. They are popular in horticulture for their ornamental value and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
